Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for NBAA Regional G650 Demo. Please save this email for future reference. Event: NBAA Regional G650 Demo Date: Thursday, September 7, 2017 Time: 9 a.m.-4 p.m. Location: Static Display

Sincerely,
